sentences.english: The mountain range has much high peaks and deep canyons. The scenery is very lovely.

sentences.english: It haunts the depths of the earth and the sea. It gleams from the hues of the shell and the precious stone.

sentences.english: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I fear no evil, for Thou art with me.
